title: Rename app webpage to 3Docarinas

requirements.text: Update all user-facing app name text on the public webpage from the current ocarina-branded wording (e.g., "Ocarina Learning & Community Platform", "Ocarina Learning", "Ocarina Hub") to "3Docarinas" (exact capitalization).

quotes: nevermind, can you change the app webpage from ocarina learning and community to 3docarinas

acceptanceCriteria: The HTML document title in frontend/index.html is "3Docarinas" (no remaining "Ocarina Learning & Community Platform").
The navbar/site name fallback text rendered by frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx shows "3Docarinas" when no branding.siteName is set (no remaining "Ocarina Learning").
The loading screen text in frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.tsx reads "Loading 3Docarinas..." (no remaining "Loading Ocarina Hub...").
No other visible UI strings on the public-facing pages refer to the old app name (manual spot-check: header, footer, loading screen, and homepage hero area).

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only Shadcn components).
Keep changes limited to renaming/relabeling; do not introduce new features or alter Stripe/checkout behavior.
nonGoals: Restoring the Stripe settings panel in admin.
Adding sorting controls for store items in the admin.
Changing logos, icons, or generated images.
